complex-form-type.label: Complex form types
complex-form-type.description: Relationship type for component/main entry in complex forms

is-primary.label: Is primary (trait)
is-primary.description: Marks component lexemes that are primary for generating subentries

hide-minor-entry.label: Hide minor entry (trait)
hide-minor-entry.description: Controls whether a minor/variant entry is hidden in Publications
